paragraphs.text: The Guardian view on counter-terror cooperation: walking the line.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: Ten days after the Paris attacks, the security repercussions continue
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Yesterday Sir John Sawers, recently retired as head of MI6, called for renewed cooperation between intelligence agencies and internet companies
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Meanwhile, European foreign ministers met to strengthen anti-terrorism coordination within the EU, and called for a stronger alliance with Arab states in combating jihadi networks
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: The EU foreign policy chief, Federica Mogherini, said:"The threat is not only the one we faced in Paris, but it is spreading in other parts of the world, starting from Muslim countries."
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: Better coordination is undoubtedly needed to foil further attacks in Europe
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: where Islamist terrorists have struck in three capitals - Madrid, London and now Paris
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Anti-terrorism raids in France and Belgium confirm that the threat continues
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The Paris killers had links with networks across the Middle East, including in Yemen
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: So the need to share intelligence to counter groups that themselves operate and communicate easily across borders cannot be disputed
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: A further illustration of this came
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: when
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: an Algerian national appeared before a Greek prosecutor on Monday over a possible link to a foiled Islamist plot to attack police in Belgium
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: It is logical for Europe to reach out to Arab countries
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The first victims of violent jihadism are, after all, to be found in the Arab world
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In the Middle East and north Africa, terrorists have targeted Muslims first and foremost
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It came as little surprise that the Arab League secretary general, Nabil el-Araby - who has recently met Ms Mogherini- immediately declared his organisation's readiness to help European partners in dealing with a danger that spans many regions
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It is, nevertheless, vital that such cooperation avoids the mistakes of the past
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This is not a war of civilisations
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It is a fight against a violent sectarian ideology that finds breeding grounds in Europe's disenfranchised communities and in the killing fields of the Middle East
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Ms Mogherini is correct to state that this is "not an issue between Europe or the west and Islam"
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: But this effort must give proper priority to precautions and standards that have, in the past, been all too often trampled upon
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The global war on terror proclaimed in the aftermath of 9/11 involved measures that violated fundamental rights and international law
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Western cooperation with repressive Arab states involved rendition flights and the outsourcing of torture
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Many regimes used repressive methods and emergency legislation to crush dissent as much as to track terrorists
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Last month this system of abuses was detailed in the damning US Senate report on the secret CIA programme that ran detention sites and organised the transfer of detainees with the cooperation of partner countries
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: some of which were in the Arab and Muslim world
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Calling for an alliance between Europe and Arab countries in a renewed fight against terrorism is important
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But it should not permit any amnesia about where this has led in the past decade
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In the Middle East and north Africa, many regimes continue to show complete disregard for basic human rights and legal procedures
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: - as the recent flogging of a Saudi blogger has illustrated
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Only one country, Tunisia, can claim to have reached some form of stable democracy in the wake of the Arab spring
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Others are run by despots or by military juntas, as in Egypt, or have been caught in a spiral of anarchy, as in Libya
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Human rights activists and civil society struggle to do their work under immense pressure
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: There are few checks and balances
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Nor is there sufficient oversight of security forces conducting anti-terrorism efforts
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: So
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: as Europeans reach out to these regimes
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: , they must beware of the pitfalls
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: An alliance with authoritarian powers, made blindly or naively, can too easily involve the abandonment of values, a dangerous sense of impunity and even indifference towards the worst abuses
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It can also backfire
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: because repression in some Arab states has provoked fresh discontent and radicalisation
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: All these things have happened in recent years
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This time, therefore, Europe must rigorously uphold its standards as it embarks on this new era of cooperation
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This time, the price of mutual assistance must not be a blind eye or a guilty silence about unacceptable abuses
paragraphs.label: assumption
